articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Tesla recalls all 3878 Cybertrucks over faulty accelerator pedal - The Verge
articles.description: Tesla has issued a recall for effectively every Cybertruck it’s delivered to customers due to a fault that’s pinning down the vehicle’s accelerator pedals.
articles.content:
Tesla recalls all 3,878 Cybertrucks over faulty accelerator pedal
